title: Journalist

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, choose a player to Interview. You learn of two random other players, and how many of them are the same faction as the interviewee.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If the Interviewed player is a member of the evil faction, they learn that they are being Interviewed, and may select the two other players who are compared to them.

fields.name: Background:
fields.value: - At night, after a Countryfolk player is hanged, you may investigate two players, learning if they are the same faction.
